title.narrative: BPD-Dong Energy-Assessment for sustainable sourcing of palm Kernel Shell from Ghana

description.narrative:
Dong Energy-Assesement and Development of Sustainable Sourcing of Palm Kernel Shells from Ghana.
The overall aim of the project was to explore the possibility of developing a high level blue print for a multi-year program for the sustainable sourcing of PKS from Ghana. This would include the development of an action plan that would enable the import of PKS as a biofuel product to Denmark, in progressively larger volumes, as well as significantly improve the sustainability performance of palm oil producers in Ghana. Specifically, the project sought to achieve the following objectives: Page 5/38 Sustainable Sourcing of Palm Kernel Shells from Ghana ¿ Understand the feasibility for PKS sourcing form small-scale processors in Ghana ¿ Identify the investment requirements for enabling a commercially viable and sustainable PKS industry ¿ Define, in collaboration with local stakeholders, a program for implementing a set of projects aimed at enhancing the productivity and sustainability of small-scale
